data.text: I have an older sister and a younger sister.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿I have an older sister and a younger sister.

data.text:
My older sister is Verxina, my Little sister is Vivlos. 
They both so cheerful, gorgeous and sociable just like mother
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿My older sister is Verxina, my Little sister is Vivlos. 
󠁿They both so cheerful, gorgeous and sociable just like mother

data.text: They both are the opposite of me...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿They both are the opposite of me...

data.text: My, my, Verxina, Vivlos!. You two look so cute all dressed up!
data.name: Relative Female
data.processed: 󠁿My, my, Verxina, Vivlos!. You two look so cute all dressed up!

data.text:
Fufu- Thank you so much, Mom bought it for me. 
We both will be dancing together afterward, so please look forward to it
data.name: Young Verxina
data.processed:
󠁿Fufu- Thank you so much, Mom bought it for me. 
󠁿We both will be dancing together afterward, so please look forward to it

data.text: ...Cheval should've come too, are you sure?
data.name: Young Verxina
data.processed: 󠁿...Cheval should've come too, are you sure?

data.text: It's fine. I'm not good at that kind of thing.
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿It's fine. I'm not good at that kind of thing.

data.text: Two glamorous people and a boring me
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Two glamorous people and a boring me

data.text: Alright! Today I will run once again
data.name: Young Verxina
data.processed: 󠁿Alright! Today I will run once again

data.text: Me too! Wait for me sister~!
data.name: Young Vivlos
data.processed: 󠁿Me too! Wait for me sister~!

data.text:
Haha, so energetic today! 
kids around you also getting cheerful .....such a Mood Maker
data.name: Club Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Haha, so energetic today! 
󠁿kids around you also getting cheerful .....such a Mood Maker

data.text: Being around them. it makes me feel like I'm an outsider
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Being around them. it makes me feel like I'm an outsider

data.text:
Me and them are fundamentally different.... I don't have much appeal at all. 
It has always been like that and will never change
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Me and them are fundamentally different.... I don't have much appeal at all. 
󠁿It has always been like that and will never change

data.text: Hah, hah, haaah. ehehe
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿Hah, hah, haaah. ehehe

data.text:
(Racing is so fun, I didn't know fun like this existed. 
Me too, I really want to. to become the strongest!)
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed:
󠁿(Racing is so fun, I didn't know fun like this existed. 
󠁿Me too, I really want to. to become the strongest!)

data.text: But those sisters over there sure have talent
data.name: Club Trainer
data.processed: 󠁿But those sisters over there sure have talent

data.text: Ahhh..!
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿Ahhh..!

data.text:
Verxina is truly promising, 
Vivlos is also a shining star, I just know it!
data.name: Club Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Verxina is truly promising, 
󠁿Vivlos is also a shining star, I just know it!

data.text:
Ah... 
uuuhhh...
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed:
󠁿Ah... 
󠁿uuuhhh...

data.text: (I see, ah.., I see. Racing too... I will just give up then)
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿(I see, ah.., I see. Racing too... I will just give up then)

data.text:
.... 
It was then that I happened to watch Arima Kinen
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿.... 
󠁿It was then that I happened to watch Arima Kinen

data.text:
The most popular is the glittering Triple Crown Horse Girl 
Big Sis and Vivlos are her fans. They were cheering her on TV, 
but the one who won was-
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿The most popular is the glittering Triple Crown Horse Girl 
󠁿Big Sis and Vivlos are her fans. They were cheering her on TV, 
󠁿but the one who won was-

data.text:
Hidden in the dazzling light of a Triple Crown Horse girl 
there was a Horse girl
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Hidden in the dazzling light of a Triple Crown Horse girl 
󠁿there was a Horse girl

data.text:
She was beautiful as she howled to the heavens amidst the applause. 
I found myself glued to the TV.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿She was beautiful as she howled to the heavens amidst the applause. 
󠁿I found myself glued to the TV.

data.text:
Something hot rose in me, and my chest trembled helplessly... 
I ran out of the room and ran like hell. And then...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Something hot rose in me, and my chest trembled helplessly... 
󠁿I ran out of the room and ran like hell. And then...

data.text: ……ah!, ME TOO, I WANT TO BE JUST LIKE HER!
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿……ah!, ME TOO, I WANT TO BE JUST LIKE HER!

data.text: I'll surpass every challenge, I won't be discouraged by anything just like her... I'll be the GREATEST HORSE GIRL!
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿I'll surpass every challenge, I won't be discouraged by anything 󠁿just like her... I'll be the GREATEST HORSE GIRL!

data.text:
(Then, with a single thought in mind 
I decided to enroll at Tracen School. 
It starts here, how enthusiastic I was...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(Then, with a single thought in mind 
󠁿I decided to enroll at Tracen School. 
󠁿It starts here, how enthusiastic I was...)

data.text:
(but, reality soon set in 
Not once did I win, Not once in a mock race, not once in class.)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(but, reality soon set in 
󠁿Not once did I win, Not once in a mock race, not once in class.)

data.text:
(They're all strong, as they should be. 
They all hard workers, Racing is what they love  
and most of all-)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(They're all strong, as they should be. 
󠁿They all hard workers, Racing is what they love  
󠁿and most of all-)

data.text:
(Pursuing their dream seriously, 
As if they don't know what it's like to lost, especially that girl.)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(Pursuing their dream seriously, 
󠁿As if they don't know what it's like to lost, especially that girl.)

data.text:
Yes!, Kitasan Black here! My goal is to be like Tokai Teio! 
to become a strong and shiny Horse girl!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
󠁿Yes!, Kitasan Black here! My goal is to be like Tokai Teio! 
󠁿to become a strong and shiny Horse girl!

data.text:
First of all, I'm going to try to win the Classic Triple Crown 
by winning all the races in a row! 
Pleased to meet you all!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
󠁿First of all, I'm going to try to win the Classic Triple Crown 
󠁿by winning all the races in a row! 
󠁿Pleased to meet you all!

data.text: Whoaah...!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Whoaah...!

data.text: (All the time, I've only looked forward.)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(All the time, I've only looked forward.)

data.text:
(Why can't I be like that, 
Why do I always end up curled up on my back at the edge)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(Why can't I be like that, 
󠁿Why do I always end up curled up on my back at the edge)

data.text: (no, I said!. Why do I keep thinking like this!)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(no, I said!. Why do I keep thinking like this!)

data.text: (I want to be like that!, I wish I could "Me too!" saying it but....ah....damn, I always like this)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(I want to be like that!, I wish I could "Me too!" saying it but....ah....damn, I always like this)

data.text:
(I keep comparing myself to others and losing confidence. 
I should just look forward, but I can't even do that)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(I keep comparing myself to others and losing confidence. 
󠁿I should just look forward, but I can't even do that)

data.text:
I'm such a weakling... 
I can't become a Great Horse girl if I keep doing this...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿I'm such a weakling... 
󠁿I can't become a Great Horse girl if I keep doing this...

data.text:
When I was walking around the school, I saw Cheval Grand 
mumbling word that seemed to completely deny her own ability
data.processed:
󠁿When I was walking around the school, I saw Cheval Grand 
󠁿mumbling word that seemed to completely deny her own ability

data.text:
She is a talented Horse Girl, regardless of what is that "Great Horse girl" actually 
it is hard to believe that there will be no results at all in the future.
data.processed:
󠁿She is a talented Horse Girl, regardless of what is that "Great Horse girl" actually 
󠁿it is hard to believe that there will be no results at all in the future.

data.text: Eh, ah, its, You... You heard it!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, ah, its, You... You heard it!

data.text:
Eh...? 
thats... because, its...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Eh...? 
󠁿thats... because, its...

data.text:
Ah... No, nothing..., 
Sorry for being weird!

title: Family Members: Father, Mother, Sister, Me, Younger sister
